subsection_analysis.refined_text: Instructions: o Roast bell peppers until charred, then peel and seed. o Blend peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, minced garlic, olive oil, pomegranate molasses, cumin, and salt in a food processor until smooth. o Serve with pita bread. Mutabal • Ingredients: o 2 eggplants o 1/4 cup tahini o 1/4 cup

o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor. o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth. o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil. cup parsley o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon coriander o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup flour o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Drain and rinse chickpeas. o Blend chickpeas, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, cumin, coriander, and salt in a food processor. o Add flour and mix until combined. o
